languages.text: {n}{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Mind}Разум{/d} отсеивает все лишнее. Шорох талонов и грохот гаек, азартные жесты людей, наивно верящих в удачу там, где царствует расчет. Есть только игра и ее компоненты: искусно сконструированная мелодия и ручной зверек. Он умнее, чем кажется.{/n}

{n}Your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Mind}mind{/d} eliminates all irrelevant factors: the ruffling of cards, the clamour of bolt nuts, the excited gestures of naive folk believing in luck where calculation reigns. There is only the game and its structural components: a skilfully crafted melody and a trained pet that is smarter than it looks.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Mind}Разум{/d} отсеивает все лишнее. Шорох талонов и грохот гаек, азартные жесты людей, наивно верящих в удачу там, где царствует расчет. Есть только игра и ее компоненты: искусно сконструированная мелодия и ручной зверек. Он умнее, чем кажется.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Dein {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Mind}Verstand{/d} eliminiert alle irrelevanten Faktoren: das Mischen der Karten, das Gezeter der Zuschauer, die aufgeregten Gesichter naiver Leute, die an das Glück glauben, wo kühle Berechnung regiert. Es gibt nur das Spiel und seine strukturellen Komponenten: eine geschickt komponierte Melodie und ein trainiertes Haustier, das klüger ist, als es aussieht.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Mind}mind{/d} eliminates all irrelevant factors: the ruffling of cards, the clamour of bolt nuts, the excited gestures of naive folk believing in luck where calculation reigns. There is only the game and its structural components: a skilfully crafted melody and a trained pet that is smarter than it looks.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Dein {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Mind}Verstand{/d} eliminiert alle irrelevanten Faktoren: das Mischen der Karten, das Gezeter der Zuschauer, die aufgeregten Gesichter naiver Leute, die an das Glück glauben, wo kühle Berechnung regiert. Es gibt nur das Spiel und seine strukturellen Komponenten: eine geschickt komponierte Melodie und ein trainiertes Haustier, das klüger ist, als es aussieht.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Votre {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Mind}esprit{/d} élimine tous les facteurs sans importance : le bruit des cartes, la clameur des boulons, les gestes surexcités des naïfs aveuglés par une prétendue chance, là où ne règne en vérité que le calcul. Seuls importent le jeu et ses composantes structurelles : une mélodie composée avec soin et un animal de compagnie bien plus intelligent qu'il n'en a l'air.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Mind}mind{/d} eliminates all irrelevant factors: the ruffling of cards, the clamour of bolt nuts, the excited gestures of naive folk believing in luck where calculation reigns. There is only the game and its structural components: a skilfully crafted melody and a trained pet that is smarter than it looks.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Votre {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Mind}esprit{/d} élimine tous les facteurs sans importance : le bruit des cartes, la clameur des boulons, les gestes surexcités des naïfs aveuglés par une prétendue chance, là où ne règne en vérité que le calcul. Seuls importent le jeu et ses composantes structurelles : une mélodie composée avec soin et un animal de compagnie bien plus intelligent qu'il n'en a l'air.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Tu {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Mind}mente{/d} elimina todos los factores irrelevantes: el crepitar de las cartas, el clamor de las tuercas, los gestos emocionados de los ingenuos que creen en la suerte cuando es cuestión de cálculos. Solo quedan el juego y sus componentes estructurales: una melodía creada con destreza y una mascota mucho más lista de lo que aparenta.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Mind}mind{/d} eliminates all irrelevant factors: the ruffling of cards, the clamour of bolt nuts, the excited gestures of naive folk believing in luck where calculation reigns. There is only the game and its structural components: a skilfully crafted melody and a trained pet that is smarter than it looks.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Tu {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Mind}mente{/d} elimina todos los factores irrelevantes: el crepitar de las cartas, el clamor de las tuercas, los gestos emocionados de los ingenuos que creen en la suerte cuando es cuestión de cálculos. Solo quedan el juego y sus componentes estructurales: una melodía creada con destreza y una mascota mucho más lista de lo que aparenta.{/n}

languages.text: {n}あなたの{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Mind}頭脳{/d}は、カードの乱れ、ボルトナットの立てる喧騒、計算が支配する場所で雲を信じる純真な人々の興奮した身振りなど、無関係な要素をすべて排除する。残るのはゲームとその構成要素だけだ。巧みに作られたメロディと、見た目以上に賢い訓練されたペット。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Mind}mind{/d} eliminates all irrelevant factors: the ruffling of cards, the clamour of bolt nuts, the excited gestures of naive folk believing in luck where calculation reigns. There is only the game and its structural components: a skilfully crafted melody and a trained pet that is smarter than it looks.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたの{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Mind}頭脳{/d}は、カードの乱れ、ボルトナットの立てる喧騒、計算が支配する場所で雲を信じる純真な人々の興奮した身振りなど、無関係な要素をすべて排除する。残るのはゲームとその構成要素だけだ。巧みに作られたメロディと、見た目以上に賢い訓練されたペット。{/n}

languages.text: {n}你聪敏的{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Mind}头脑{/d}消除了所有无关因素。无论是纸牌的刷刷声，螺栓和螺母发出来的声音，还是那些头脑简单、误以为这是个运气游戏的玩家兴奋的喝彩声，都从你耳边消失了。你眼中只剩下游戏本身的各个成分：一段精心制作的旋律，以及一只训练有素的宠物。它虽然看起来又蠢又笨，但实际上很聪明。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Mind}mind{/d} eliminates all irrelevant factors: the ruffling of cards, the clamour of bolt nuts, the excited gestures of naive folk believing in luck where calculation reigns. There is only the game and its structural components: a skilfully crafted melody and a trained pet that is smarter than it looks.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你聪敏的{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Mind}头脑{/d}消除了所有无关因素。无论是纸牌的刷刷声，螺栓和螺母发出来的声音，还是那些头脑简单、误以为这是个运气游戏的玩家兴奋的喝彩声，都从你耳边消失了。你眼中只剩下游戏本身的各个成分：一段精心制作的旋律，以及一只训练有素的宠物。它虽然看起来又蠢又笨，但实际上很聪明。{/n}

languages.text: {n}{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Mind}Zihnin{/d}; kartların karıştırılması, vidaların haykırışları ve hesaplamanın hüküm sürdüğü yerde şansa inanan saf topluluğun heyecan dolu hareketleri gibi tüm alakasız faktörleri eliyor. Artık sadece oyunu ve yapısal bileşenlerini görüyorsun. Bileşenler, büyük bir hünerle bestelenmiş bir melodi ve göründüğünden daha zeki, eğitilmiş bir hayvandan ibaret.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Mind}mind{/d} eliminates all irrelevant factors: the ruffling of cards, the clamour of bolt nuts, the excited gestures of naive folk believing in luck where calculation reigns. There is only the game and its structural components: a skilfully crafted melody and a trained pet that is smarter than it looks.{/n}
